posts.post_content: This is the result of the [Riptide Laboratory](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Riptide Laboratory) wizards' first attempt to revive the Sliver species. Slivers came to Dominaria from Rath when the plane was overlaid onto Dominaria during the Phyrexian Invasion. It's kind of like a preview of things that were to come later on in the Onslaught Block, as later experiments successfully revive Slivers and we see them in Legions and Scourge.
posts.html:
